lead_paragraph: TUESDAY, SEPT. 23, 1851.--The examination of the thirteen individuals concerned in the riot at Christiana, which terminated in the death of Mr. Edward Gorsuch, was resumed before Alderman Reigart, in the Court House at Lancaster. There was a large number of strangers from Maryland and Pennsylvania in attendance.

headline.main: THE CHRISTIANA NEGRO RIOT.; Examination of the Thirteen Prisoners, and their Commitment for High Treason.

abstract: Charges the Christiana outrage to be treason
